title: Murder Mystery 2 (MM2) Mobile: Scripts and Hacks
text:
Here you can download new, tested scripts and hacks for the popular mobile game Murder Mystery 2 (MM2). We post for you some of the best scripts that you will be able to run for free without any problems. If you want to see players through textures on the map, use Fake Knife, AutoFram, move around the map with Teleport or enable Kill Murder, then this script will fit your style of play perfectly.



Using this hack in the mobile version of MM2 game you will have more gaming opportunities unlike other players, raise your rank and surprise your friends with hidden game settings. Murder Mystery 2 is one of the oldest and most popular mobile game in the world of Roblox and that's why many players are already using scripts to improve their game.
How to use Roblox Scripts?
creator: FREEHub, TheHanki, baclan.
